section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Expert Group on the exchange of information on Best Available Techniques related to industrial emissions (IED Article 13 Forum)#E02611#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2611#Member#C
goals__remit: HWE represents more than 150 hazardous waste treatment installations in Europe operating a wide variety of processes with a total capacity of 4,6 million tons per year. HWE aims at promoting high quality treatments of hazardous waste, environment and human health protection and safety of workers in the legislation.
